name: Flip Runner (itch)
description:
This game was made for week 158 of the Weekly Game Jam. The theme for this week was "Replay".  Flip Runner is a simple platformer made in Unity that fits the theme in two ways. The first is that when you get all the way through a level, it then flips the world on it's head and you replay the level again from the underside. The second way that the game fits the replay theme is that the player has a rewind mechanic that when the R button is held, it rewinds the players position.

Controls:

WASD to move

Shift to Sprint

Space to Jump

Space when on Wall to Wall Jump

Hold 'R' to Rewind
